question: Which ministry launched SAMPARK on World AIDS Day?
option1: Ministry of Drinking Water and Sanitation
option3: Ministry of Health and Family Welfar
answer: Ministry of Health and Family Welfar
explanation: On World AIDS Day, Minister of State in the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare Smt.Anupriya Patel urges all to join hands to end the epidemic by 2030 and Launches National Strategic Plan (2017-24) and Mission "SAMPARK".
